content: I just got this at my work email after a talk. Never, ever email a speaker to hit on them. This is wildly unprofessional, and apologizing in advance because you acknowledge that it might be inappropriate only makes it worse. "Respectfully" my ass.

photo.alt:
A screenshot of part of an email. Text follows: 

Not that expect anything, I like to share my linked-in on a professional basis. [Link redacted here]

Also as another listener mention, Love the hair style. (very cute)

Though my curiosity has been peaked with your relationship status? as I was taken back by beauty (I apologize if this question is inappropriate)

Respectfully,
